Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Reroute at Milwaukee/Western
ShortDescription: 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Armitage, Damen and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Milwaukee, Armitage, Damen and Milwaukee due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Fullerton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
